subject: Attn; beneficiary
body:
Attn; beneficiary
(HAPPY NEW YEAR 2024)
However, it is our pleasure to inform you that an international
certified bankers draft has been approved in your favor by the
DEUTSCHE BANK.
The international certified bankers draft Value  â‚¬11, 570,000.00 Only
as your inheritance fund and you can clear your international
certified bankers draft in your bank or any bank of your choice in the
world.
We have also concluded delivery arrangement with our accredited
courier service Company to be fully insured by Insurance to oversee
the delivery of your international certified bankers draft to you
within 72 hours without any further delay. 
In view of this
development, you are requested only to offset the Courier delivery and
transit Insurance charges.
upon your confirmation to receive this draft the scan copy of the
draft will be send to you through email attachment for your
confirmation.
Mrs. Kristalina Georgieva
International Monetary Fund {imf}

subject: Re: Attn; beneficiary
body:
Hello there,

Happy New Year to you too! I'm thrilled to hear about this certified banker's draft approved in my favor. It sounds like a fantastic opportunity.

Could you please provide me with more details? For instance, how was I selected for this? Also, could you explain the process of clearing the draft in my bank?

I'm also curious about the courier service. Which company will be handling the delivery? And how much are the courier delivery and transit insurance charges?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Miranda
